nl.helixsoft.util

Class URLBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.util.URLBuilder

  • public class URLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Build a url of the following form BASE_URL/optional/additions?param=val¶m=val¶m=val class can be subclassed to provide extra utility methods.

    Most methods return this so calls can be chained.
